data.name: Monster Energy Supercross 5 - Legends Pack Vol. 2
data.detailed_description:
Race like a real legend with the Legends Pack Vol. 2!

Choose from five supercross heroes from the past, such as Ryan Villopoto, Ryan Dungey, Jeff Emig, Cole Seely and embark on epic races on an original historic circuit inspired by Daytona 1974.
Enjoy the thrills that race bikes have to offer. Buy the Legends Pack Vol. 2 now!
data.about_the_game:
Race like a real legend with the Legends Pack Vol. 2!

Choose from five supercross heroes from the past, such as Ryan Villopoto, Ryan Dungey, Jeff Emig, Cole Seely and embark on epic races on an original historic circuit inspired by Daytona 1974.
Enjoy the thrills that race bikes have to offer. Buy the Legends Pack Vol. 2 now!
data.short_description: Race back in time and compete with the champions of the past with the Legends Pack Vol. 2!

fullgame.name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 5

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U or AMD Ryzen 5 3400G or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 (2048 VRAM) or Vega 11 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD FX-9590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (4096 VRAM) or Radeon R9 390X (8192 VRAM) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
